description:
With the Zoo Director’s permission, Panda has a change to try his paw in different zoo 
jobs.  Mei Mei finds the lover of her life, in the wrong person.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Panda Is No Longer a Panda / Mei Mei`s Prince
Panda-kun Panda Janakunaru / Mei Mei no Ouji-sama
パンダくんパンダじゃなくなる / メイメイの王子様
